reference.title: fdopen : turn open file into a stream

section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: fdopen produces a file descriptor of type FILE *, from a descriptor for an already-open file (returned, for example, by the system subroutine open rather than by fopen). The mode argument has the same meanings as in fopen.

section.title: Returns
section.p: File pointer or NULL, as for fopen.
